title: How to publish a book - Quora

response.answer_text: You need to do some research. Your question is like asking how can I perform brain surgery. Is publishing as difficult as brain surgery? No, but you have many options and dozens of pitfalls. Your local library has books on publishing, traditional vs self-publishing. Sit down and read them until you gain a basic understanding of the industry. Whatever you do, don’t pay someone to publish it for you. It’s a rip-off. I taught self-publishing classes on a college level.
